brief: Sets the vertex at the index position
name: setVertex()
description: The setVertex() method defines the coordinates of the vertex point located at the position defined by the index parameter. This method works when shapes are created as shown in the example above, but won't work properly when a shape is defined explicitly (e.g. createShape(RECT, 20, 20, 80, 80).

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x value for the vertex

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y value for the vertex

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: the z value for the vertex

parameters.name: vec
parameters.description: the PVector to define the x, y, z coordinates
